text: What do you think your life might be like in 30 years?
What is another dangerous outcome you can imagine happening from AI?
What is another positive outcome you can imagine happening from AI? What would need to be true for that to happen?
What is ONE specific ethical or moral principle, virtue, or value that you think is core to how you live your life?
What is one ethical or moral principle, virtue, or value that you think is important but not reflected in the way technology is developed today?
What is something unique, that other people might not think about, but that you really want to be true about the future?
If you could make world leaders understand one thing, what would it be?
What is one unique perspective that your culture brings that you want to preserve into the future?
If you could have your AI think, behave / respond like any person in the world, who would it be and why?
If an AI assistant makes a cultural mistake, what would be the most appropriate way for it to acknowledge and correct the error?
